articles.title: Telco group seeks 6GHz frequency band for sustainable 5G, economy boost - ETTelecom
articles.description: In a letter to the Department of Telecommunications (DoT) secretary K Rajaraman, dated April 7, 2023, COAI director general SP Kochhar said that the licensed 6 GHz is ideal for commercial success and deployment of 5G NR, 5.5G, and 6G in the future.
